newsitem.title: JAPAN: GOLF-JAPAN CHAMPIONSHIP FIRST ROUND SCORES.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-JAPAN CHAMPIONSHIP FIRST ROUND SCORES.

text.p: Results in the first round of the Japan Championship, a Championship of Golf event, at the Golden Palm Country Club in Kagoshima on Saturday (All Japanese, matches over 18 holes):
Toru Suzuki beat Shigeki Maruyama by 2 holes
Hajime Meshiai beat Hisayuki Sasaki by 1 hole
Hidemichi Tanaka beat Masanobu Kimura 3 and 2
Kazuhiko Hosokawa beat Masahiro Kuramoto 2 and 1
